titleInfo.title: Country Music USA star Pee Wee King at North High School

mods.abstract: Two color window card (red and black on white) Hatch poster announcing the Country Music star Pee Wee King show with Redd Stewart, Marion Worth, the Collins Sisters and the Golden West Cowboys at the North High School Auditorium on April 5. Poster features metal photoplates of Pee Wee King, Redd Stewart, Marion Worth and the Collin Sisters with the Golden West Cowboys.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
